plugin.name: SK_TickBar
plugin.author: Aello
plugin.description: Regen tick with hp, mana, and pe bar

muclient.script: win=GetPluginID()GAUGE_HEIGHT=15;HP_HEIGHT=12;BAR_WIDTH=645;NUMBER_OF_TICKS=4;BACKGROUND_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"gray"BOX_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"dodgerblue"HP_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"green"ME_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"blue"PE_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"yellow"maxHP=100;maxTime=61;function draw_bar()currentTime=tonumber(GetVariable("tickTime"))or 0;currentHP=tonumber(GetVariable("HP"))or 100;currentME=tonumber(GetVariable("ME"))or 100;currentPE=tonumber(GetVariable("PE"))or 100;if currentHP<30 then HP_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"red"elseif currentHP<60 then HP_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"orange"elseif currentHP<80 then HP_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"lime"else HP_COLOUR=ColourNameToRGB"green"end;local a=BAR_WIDTH;local b=GetInfo(275)if b==0 or b<0 and math.abs(b)<GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT+2 then TextRectangle(GetInfo(272),GetInfo(273),GetInfo(274),-(GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT+2),GetInfo(276),GetInfo(282)or 0,GetInfo(277),GetInfo(278),GetInfo(279))end;WindowCreate(win,0,0,BAR_WIDTH,GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT,10,0,BACKGROUND_COLOUR)WindowRectOp(win,2,0,0,0,0,BACKGROUND_COLOUR)local c=currentTime/maxTime;local d=a*c;local e=currentHP/maxHP;local f=currentME/maxHP;local g=currentPE/maxHP;local h=a*e;local i=a*f;local j=a*g;if math.floor(d)>0 then WindowGradient(win,0,0,d,GAUGE_HEIGHT/2,0x000000,BOX_COLOUR,2)WindowGradient(win,0,GAUGE_HEIGHT/2,d,GAUGE_HEIGHT,BOX_COLOUR,0x000000,2)end;if currentHP>0 then WindowGradient(win,0,GAUGE_HEIGHT,h,GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT/3,HP_COLOUR,HP_COLOUR,2)end;if currentME>0 then WindowGradient(win,0,GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT/3,i,GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT/3*2,ME_COLOUR,ME_COLOUR,2)end;if currentPE>0 then WindowGradient(win,0,GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT/3*2,j,GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT,PE_COLOUR,PE_COLOUR,2)end;local k=a/NUMBER_OF_TICKS;for l=1,NUMBER_OF_TICKS do WindowLine(win,l*k,0,l*k,GAUGE_HEIGHT+HP_HEIGHT,ColourNameToRGB("silver"),0,1)end;check(WindowRectOp(win,1,0,0,0,0,ColourNameToRGB("lightgrey")))WindowFont(win,"tickFont","Trebuchet MS",7,true,false,false,false)WindowText(win,"tickFont","Tick Tock Timer: "..currentTime,5,0,0,0,ColourNameToRGB("white"),false)WindowShow(win,true)end;function OnPluginWorldOutputResized()draw_bar()end;function OnPluginClose()WindowShow(win,false)end;function OnPluginDisable()WindowShow(win,false)end

timer.name: tickTime
timer.send: tickTime = GetVariable("tickTime") or 0 tickTime = (tickTime + 1) % 61 SetVariable("tickTime", tickTime) draw_bar ()

A slight breeze would really improve things\.|The breeze dies away to nothing\.|There's a blizzard out here, making it quite difficult to see\.|The snow turns to a cold rain\.|A light drizzle is falling here\.|The arid wind brings no relief\. |A few drops of rain are falling amidst a fierce windstorm\.)$
trigger.send: currentTime = GetVariable("tickTime") or 0 if tonumber(currentTime) >= 55 or tonumber(currentTime) <= 5 then SetVariable("tickTime", 0) draw_bar() --Note("Tick?") end
HP = "%1" ME = "%2" PE = "%3" SetVariable("HP", HP) SetVariable("ME", ME) SetVariable("PE", PE) draw_bar ()
